value:
More Information:
You can use the My Summoner
unit in Heroes Journey too.
What's more, the amount of SP
you earn will be doubled. Partake
in Heroes Journey with one of
your favorite Hero partners!

My Summoner:
Decide what you look like and
how you greet your friends in
this world. Your summoner will
be able to join in battles only
within specific events.

Expanded Summoner Support:
Summoner Support bonds can
be formed with up to four Heroes
when you have been subscribed
to Feh Pass for 2+ months, and
up to five Heroes at 3+ months.
